title: Greens select former mayoral candidate to run in Gorton and Denton byelection
summary_full: Hannah Spencer, a Trafford councillor and a plumber, ran as the party’s candidate for mayor of Manchester in 2024The Green party has selected former mayoral candidate Hannah Spencer to run in the upcoming Gorton and Denton byelection.Spencer, a Trafford councillor and plumber by trade, has resided in the constituency in the past and was the Green’s candidate for mayor of Manchester during the 2024 election, where she finished fifth behind Labour’s Andy Burnham, who retained the post, as well as Conservative, independent and Reform candidates. Continue reading...
